_description: De Obediencia — two couplets translating ‘Portatur leuiter quod portat quisque libenter’ which precedes it in John Grimestone’s sermon notebook

NLS18721.Transcription:
It is wol lithliche ibornÞer good wil wilcomet
                    befornÞat he doth aȝen his wilIt semet hard with rith an
                    skil
NLS18721.Editions:
Wilson,  Edward. 
             A Descriptive Index of the English Lyrics in John of Grimestone’s
                Preaching Book.
Medium Ævum Monographs
         n.s. 2. Oxford, 1973: 29.
